titleStmt.title: To SAMUEL MORLEY,Samuel Morley (1809-86; Dictionary of National Biography), Chairman of the Administrative Reform Association; wealthy textile manufacturer, liberal politician and leading nonconformist; became proprietor of Daily News, Liberal MP and strong supporter of Gladstone 1868-85; Treasurer, Congregationalist Board of Education. See Pilgrim Letters 7, p. 646 and To Joseph Paxton, 26 June 1855. [24 JUNE 1855]
